wikipedia_page.main: Carole Ashby (born 24 March 1955 in Cannock, Staffordshire) is an English actress and pinup girl. She appeared as a glamour girl in the British news media during the 1970s.

response: * Carole Ashby (born 1955 in Cannock) an English actress and former pin-up girl

In 2017 Roos teamed up with former Bond Girl Carole Ashby to make a number of films exploring the mysterious side of life.  A pilot Ashby's Odyssey was filmed in 2018 produced and directed by Roos and presented by Carole Ashby which received its premiere at Regent Street Cinema.https://www.regentstreetcinema.com/programme/a-view-to-a-kill/ A series is pre production as of 2020.
* Louise (Carole Ashby) (series 5–9) – Later leader of the Communist resistance, she is also in love with René.
